channel.title: syspro on Stock2Shop
channel.description: Recent content in syspro on Stock2Shop

item.title: Syspro
item.description: Create orders on Syspro This allows Stock2Shop to create an order on Syspro when an order has been received from your sales channel(s). Sync Product Images When integrating with Syspro, we can pull Images associated with the relevant Products into Stock2shop. These Images will be applied to the Products and will be added to the Webstore when the Product is synced through. Push Products We can update your Product data from Syspro in 3 minute intervals.
